mapper.select:
SELECT convert(char(19), t.processtime, 120) as processtime, t.applyid, t.applyno, t.exclusivefg, t.applyempid, t1.empname as applyempname, t.processempid, t2.empname as processempname, t.applytype, dict1.busidictname as applytypedict, t.status, dict2.busidictname as statusdict, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by t.processtime desc, t.applyno ) as rownum FROM [dbo].[t_applyform] t inner join [dbo].[t_empinfo] t1 on t.applyempid = t1.empid and t.deletefg = t1.deletefg inner join [dbo].[t_empinfo] t2 on t.processempid = t2.empid and t.deletefg = t2.deletefg left join [dbo].[s_busidict] dict1 on t.applytype = dict1.busidictid and dict1.busidicttypeid = 'OA_PC001_ApplyType' left join [dbo].[s_busidict] dict2 on t.status = dict2.busidictid and dict2.busidicttypeid = 'OA_PC003_Status' where t.deletefg = '0' and t.status in (6)
and t.personfilecheckid = #{empid}

SELECT count(*) FROM [dbo].[t_empinfo] t where deletefg = '0'
and t.cardno = #{cardno}
select v.depid as busidictid, v.depiddict as busidictname from [dbo].[v_orgdepposemp] v where v.orgcdid = #{orgcdid} group by v.depid, v.depiddict order by v.depid
mapper.update: update [dbo].[s_busidicttype] set busidicttypeid = #{typeid}, busidicttypename = #{typename} where busidicttypeid = #{busidicttypeid}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM [dbo].[t_nationlegalday] t where deletefg = '0'
and t.legalyear = #{legalyear}

SELECT count(*) FROM [dbo].[t_annualvctn] t where deletefg = '0'
and t.year = #{year}

SELECT t.dailydevicename FROM [dbo].[t_dailydeviceinfo] t where t.deletefg = '0'
and t.dailydeviceid = #{dailydeviceid}

SELECT t.empname FROM [dbo].[t_empinfo] t where t.deletefg = '0'
and t.empid = #{empid}
